i came here about 6 months ago, so my memory of this place is bit scattered.  The bits i remember are that this place is awesome.  we managed to make reservation for 5 of us girls, but we got lost trying to find our way into the little alleys.  We were about 30-45mins late and they had given away our table.  However, they were still extremely accommodating and made space for us at the upstairs seating.The staff was great and gave us great recommendations of the food.  Even though we're obviously tourist, they were not snotty at all.  Very friend and helpful staff.  I only remember great things about the food.  the olive oil for the bread was divine, the oysters were really fresh and the sauce they put on it complimented the flavor perfectly, the suckling pig was cooked perfecti will definitely be back next time i'm in barcelona.  this is definitely tied with the la boqueria mercat meal i had.
